Raskolnikov confronts Svidrigaïlov

Tense alleyway, Raskolnikov fuming, Svidrigaïlov smirking  
‘Why do you bother me now?’  

Raskolnikov: ‘I’ll kill you if you harm my sister!’  

Svidrigaïlov: ‘You think I have plans?’  

Raskolnikov: ‘Everyone has their own agenda.’  

---

Light summer clothes, Svidrigaïlov's ring glinting  
Curiosity in the air, tension rising  
Svidrigaïlov: ‘Why the hurry, Raskolnikov?’  

Raskolnikov: ‘Time is precious. Speak quickly!’  

Svidrigaïlov: ‘You suspect me, yet want friendship?’

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov confronts Svidrigaïlov about his intentions towards his sister, threatening violence if necessary.
